name: bubble-beam
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Speed by one stage.
short_effect: Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Speed by one stage.

flavor_text.ruby-sapphire: Forcefully sprays bubbles that may lower SPEED.
flavor_text.emerald: Forcefully sprays bubbles that may lower SPEED.
flavor_text.firered-leafgreen: A spray of bubbles strikes the foe. It may lower the foe’s SPEED stat.
